title: Pixel 4a rear camera is not working after feb updates
content:
When I open pixel 4a back/rear camera and try to take photo, all the images are shakey . Same thing happen when try to take video. It is working fine before feb updates. It is really frustrated because I bought  pixel 4a for camera purpose but  it is not working properly. Please help me as soon as possible.

Not e: Front camera working fine.
